name: Dusty McBride
descriptions: Dusty McBride is a rancher living in Novac in 2281.

Dusty and Alice, his wife, are the salt of Novac's earth. Honest, hardworking, and married for more than 50 years, they've seen much of what wasteland has to offer. Despite that, their love is as strong as ever as they continue to raise brahmin together in Novac.

topics.response_text: You must mean what's left of it. Somebody's been attacking our animals at night. We're down to less than half of what we had a few weeks back.

topics.topic_text: Did you get a look at the attacker?
topics.response_text: Beg your pardon mister, but them two-headed beeves ain't worth getting shot over.

topics.topic_text: I heard you've been losing livestock.
topics.response_text: Losing don't describe it. It's a massacre. Few more days and there won't be nothing left to lose.

topics.topic_text: No one is going to attack your corral from now on.
topics.response_text: Well I don't know how you done it, but I do know how I can thank you. Please take this, compliments of Alice and myself.
Well don't worry yourself too much over it. We'll get by.

topics.topic_text: I'll see if I can catch whoever's responsible.
topics.response_text: We'd be grateful. Especially if you find 'em before they get my whole stock. But don't go getting yourself killed over it.

topics.topic_text: Tell me what you know about the attacks.
topics.response_text: Every night around midnight Alice and I'll wake up to some crazy hollering and gun shots. You'd think the world was ending all over again.

topics.topic_text: What do you do here in Novac?
topics.response_text: Oh, I tend to my ranch, that's about it. Alice'll tell you. I don't get out a whole lot.
You seen Alice? Ain't like her to be gone this long.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Boone's wife?
topics.response_text: Well, to be honest with you, I don't really know them two as well as I might.

topics.topic_text: Come with me. There's something you should see, in front of the dinosaur.
topics.response_text: You sure seem worked up about something. I suppose I can hear you out.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for a man in a checkered coat. Have you seen anyone like that?
topics.response_text: Can't say as I have, but we usually keep to ourselves down here. You might have more luck up by the motel.
